title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernizing Mercedes-Benz’s Global Ordering System with Gen AI (IND218)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用生成式AI现代化梅赛德斯-奔驰全球订购系统 (IND218)
abstract: Join Mercedes-Benz to learn about how they are transforming their global vehicle ordering system by migrating mainframe-based infrastructure to AWS and accelerating modernization with Generative AI. Their approach blends replatforming with AWS GenAI-driven code transformation, enabling AI agents to streamline architecture, development, and testing. This modernization secures business continuity, strengthens security, and boosts agility, resulting in a scalable, future-ready IT landscape. Supported by a robust cloud ecosystem focused on security and developer enablement, Mercedes-Benz’s journey offers valuable insights and best practices for successful application modernization and risk reduction. This presentation is brought to you by Capgemini, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 加入梅赛德斯-奔驰,了解他们如何通过将基于大型机的基础设施迁移到AWS并利用生成式AI加速现代化来转型其全球车辆订购系统。他们的方法将重新平台化与AWS生成式AI驱动的代码转换相结合,使AI代理能够简化架构、开发和测试。这一现代化举措确保了业务连续性,增强了安全性,并提升了敏捷性,从而打造出可扩展且面向未来的IT环境。在专注于安全和开发者赋能的强大云生态系统支持下,梅赛德斯-奔驰的旅程为成功的应用现代化和风险降低提供了宝贵的见解和最佳实践。本演示由AWS合作伙伴凯捷呈现。

presenter.name: Christian Klemme
presenter.title: Senior Manager Global Key Sales Processes
